Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Class containing all the game info needed to play. COntains also the reference to all players, teams, islands, clouds, characters, and so on.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int playerNumber, String nicknameOfCreator, Boolean expertMode)
      Main constructor for the game. Handles setup of modifies, islands, players, bag, clouds and all the game board. Picks random characters, fills the pieces if needed, updates teams.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - number of players
      nicknameOfCreator - nickname of the creator
      expertMode - boolean flag for expert mode (i.e.: characters)

  • Method Details

    • setupFill

      public void setupFill()
      Fills all the pieces that need a setup at the start of the game

    • updateTeams

      public void updateTeams()
      Sets team ID in player objects

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Changes current player, resets modifiers. If planning phase ends, moves to action. If action phase ends, skips to next turn. Updates turn orders accordingly. If there is only 1 player connected, start a 10 sec timer, if nobody reconnects, sends the game (the winner is the last online player).

    • connectedPlayersNumber

      public Integer connectedPlayersNumber()
      Returns:
      the number of active (connected) players

    • updateNextTurnOrder

      public void updateNextTurnOrder()
      Updates the order of the next turn, depending on the assistants played

    • turnStartFill

      public void turnStartFill()
      Same as SetupFill(), but done every start of turn to refill empty clouds

    • getAStudent

      public Integer getAStudent()
      Gets (and removes) a random student from the game bag
      Returns:
      a random student from the bag

    • getAStudent

      public Integer getAStudent(Color color)
      Gets (and removes) a random student (of input color) from the game bag. Used only in the game setup, for the islands.
      Parameters:
      color - color of the student to get
      Returns:
      a random student (of input color) from the bag

    • resolveIsland

      public void resolveIsland(Island island)
      Handles resolving the island and unifying it with adjacent ones accordingly to the rules. Loops until all unifiable islands are merged. For unifying, see Game.unifyIsland(Island, Island)
      Parameters:
      island - island to resolve

    • unifyIslands

      public void unifyIslands(Island toKeep, Island toRemove)
      Merges 2 islands. The first one is kept, the second one is deleted after adding all its content to the first one
      Parameters:
      toKeep - island to be kept
      toRemove - island to be deleted

    • addPlayer

      public Boolean addPlayer(String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player to add
      Returns:
      false if the game is full, true otherwise

    • resetModifiers

      public void resetModifiers()
      Resets turn modifiers

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      if there's not yet a winner, finds one and ends game

      Returns:
      true if there's a winner, false otherwise
